column4: Hi!! People, can you tell me, if 1.7Gb RAM ids enough for Ubuntu 11.10-64-bit????

thank.. I'm writting from it which was started from USB-stick.. It seems to work slow. Hope It will be better if I install it on hard drive. Could it work faster from hard drive then from Flash or it it's gona be the same???
most likely it'll be faster when you get to install proper gfx drivers
